title: Merging EuW
body: I move to canada a  year ago and i left my account to my brother  because he was getting into league so i made a new one on a Na sever when i arrive here and now he has decided to quit league so I would like know if riot will merg my two accounts together  so i have all my stuff back again  without having to have two accounts for one person! both accounts have over 1000 dollars spent

replies.body: First up, [**Account Sharing is against the ToU**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204214670) so remember not to do that in the future! We don't have ways of merging accounts either since the content was purchased elsewhere.
give me a break its my freaking brother not some stranger
